channel.title: Please Help
channel.description:
[code]:: Preparing for compile... :: Auto-setting envriomental variables... :: :: Scanning for latest JDK version... :: :: Found JDK 1.6.0_03 :: Results: client.java:15951: illegal start of expression public int needSpecialAmount() { ^ 1 error :: Done! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I need to fix this error but i dont know how, does anyone know how i can fix it? if so please post :confused:

item.title: Please Help
item.dc:creator: @LtJesus LtJesus
item.description:
@LtJesus wrote:

[code]public void calculateSpecial() {
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount <= 24) { // dagger
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
specialDamage3 = 0;
sendMessage(“You do not have enough special energy left.”);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount >= 25) { // dagger
startAnimation(1062);
specialAmount -= 25;
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153 && specialAmount <= 49) { //maul
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
specialDamage3 = 0;
sendMessage(“You do not have enough special energy left.”);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153 && specialAmount >= 50) { // dagger
startAnimation(1062);
specialAmount -= 50;
} else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861) { // mage bow
specialAmount -= 50;
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4503 && specialAmount >= 100) { // dagger
startAnimation(2890);
specialAmount -= 100;
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153 && specialAmount >= 50) { // dagger
startAnimation(1667);
specialAmount -= 100;
} else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305) { // d long
startAnimation(1058);
specialDamage = 18 + misc.random(5);
specialAmount -= 25;
} else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434) { // d mace
startAnimation(1060);
specialAmount -= 25;
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount <= 99) { // d hally
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
sendMessage(“You do not have enough special energy left.”);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount >= 100) { // d hally
startAnimation(1665);
specialDamage = misc.random(playerMaxHit + 8);
specialAmount -= 100;
}
}

public int needSpecialAmount() {
    if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == 861) // godsword
    {
        return 50;
    }
    if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == 5698) // godsword
    {
        return 25;
    }
	if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == 4153) // godsword
    {
        return 50;
    }
    if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == 4503) // godsword
    {
        return 100;
    }
    if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1305) // godsword
    {
        return 25;
    }
    if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1434) // godsword
    {
        return 25;
    }
    if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == 3204) // godsword
    {
        return 100;
    } else {
        return 25;
    }
}

public int GetBlockAnim(int id) {
    blockDelay = 1;
    if (id == 4755) // Veracs Flail
    {
        return 2063;
    }
    if (id == 1171 || id == 1173 || id == 1175 || id == 1177 || id == 1179
            || id == 1181 || id == 1183 || id == 1185 || id == 1187
            || id == 1189 || id == 1191 || id == 1193 || id == 1195
            || id == 1197 || id == 1199 || id == 1201 || id == 1540
            || id == 2890 || id == 3122 || id == 3488 || id == 3758
            || id == 4072 || id == 4156 || id == 4224 || id == 4507
            || id == 4512 || id == 6215 || id == 6524 || id == 7676) // shields
    {
        return 1156;
    }
    if (id == 4710) // Ahrims Staff
    {
        return 2079;
    }
    if (id == 1319 || id == 7158 || id == 4503) // 2h Swords
    {
        return 2063;
    }
    if (id == 4153) // Granite Maul
    {
        return 1666;
    }
    if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 84
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 772
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1379
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1381
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1383
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1385
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1385
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1387
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1389
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1393
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1395
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1397
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1399
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1401
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1403
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1405
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1407
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1409
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3053
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3054
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4170
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6603
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6726
            || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6727) // Staves
    {
        return 430;
    }
    if (id == 3102 || id == 3101 || id == 3100 || id == 3099 || id == 3098
            || id == 3097 || id == 3096 || id == 3095) // Whip
    {
        return 1659;
    }
    if (id == 4151) // Whip
    {
        return 1659;
    } else {
        return 1156;
    }
}

public int GetXItemsInBag(int ItemID) {
    int ItemCount = 0;

    for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
        if ((playerItems[i] - 1) == ItemID) {
            ItemCount++;
        }
    }
    return ItemCount;
}

[/code]

Thats what it looks like :o
